RelatedSentence: ( JTA ) - Dozens of Israelis serving in the Israel Defense Forces military reserves protested settler violence outside the Israeli West Bank settlement of Yitzhar .
( JTA ) - Dozens of Israelis serving in the Israel Defense Forces military reserves protested settler violence outside the Israeli West Bank settlement of Yitzhar .
On May 4 , Yitzhar Rabbi Yitzchak Ginsburgh blamed the IDF and the Israeli government for provoking the attack .
In the wake of violence emanating from Yitzhar , the Israel Police decided Sunday to establish a permanent base there .
